attributes.action: Criminalise Vile Snuff (Murder) Movies Like 3 Men 1 Hammer
attributes.additional_details: Vile snuff movies (DO NOT IGNORE THIS: please do NOT watch them - they come with many serious warnings) like 3 men 1 hammer and the Dagestan Beheadings have been likened as WORSE THAN child pornography. A free internet is a free internet, but some things, like glorifying a real murder should be BANNED and downloaders should be treated in the same way as child porn downloaders. There are children and very young adults watching these "snuff films" proven by youtube "reaction" videos. When Jamie Bulger was murdered, we were talking about "Child's Play" a truly sinister film title in light of the abovementioned online clips (again DO NOT WATCH). We need laws to protect vulnerable minds.
